title: Good Eats
name: Good Eats
description:
A Map by Drmoldawer

Noteworthy restaurants around the city.

properties.name: 12 Chairs
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer56 MacDougal St., New York, NYGreat little cafe restaurant. Not really business lunch appropriate, but good food.

properties.name: Acqua Santa
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer556 Driggs Ave, Brooklyn, NYOne of my favorite Italian restaurants. Delicious food, great wine selection, an a beautiful outdoor garden with a vine-covered trellis.

properties.name: Beacon
properties.description: Posted by DrmoldawerVery fancy steakhouse. Good food.

properties.name: Bolo
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer23 East 22nd Street, New York, NYA Spanish restaurant a la Bobby Flay.

properties.name: Boqueria
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer53 W 19th St, new york, nyExcellent, if pricey, tapas.

properties.name: Brass Monkey
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer55 Little West 12th St, New York, NYBrass Monkey (212) 675-6686

properties.name: Bubby's
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer118 Hudson, new york, nyGood soul food.

properties.name: Cacio e Pepe
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer182 Second Avenue, New York, NYExcellent Italian food in a charming, old-fashioned place.

properties.name: Cafe Grumpy
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 193 Meserole Ave, Brooklyn, NYGreat coffee. Great coffee!

properties.name: Cafe Lalo
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 201 W. 83rd St., New York, NYLovely little cafe with all kinds of wonderful desserts and excellent coffee.

properties.name: Cafe Orlin
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 41 St. Mark\'s Place, new york, nyNice bistro in the Astor Place area. Good food, medium prices, perfect for a cup of coffee and dessert after a show at the Public.

properties.name: Country Home & Comfort
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 43 W 22nd St, new york, nycrummy cafe in a furniture store, but they\'ve got wifi

properties.name: Crumbs
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer  37 East 8th Street, new york, nyCute cafe with free wifi.

properties.name: Crumbs
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer  1371 Third Avenue, new york, nyNice cafe with free wifi.

properties.name: DTUT
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 1626 2nd Avenue, New York, NY 10028Great, funky cafe

properties.name: Deborah
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer43 Carmine Street, New York, NYGreat little upscale restaurant on Carmine. Very reasonably priced, excellent for brunch.

properties.name: East Japanese Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 366 3rd Ave, new york, NYExcellent, cheap sushi delivered via conveyor belt. Karaoke upstairs. Favorite place in town.

properties.name: Epistrophy
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer200 Mott St, new york, nyGreat, cozy little Italian place. Very hip. Excellent pasta. Wine bar.

properties.name: Fada
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer530 Driggs Ave, brooklyn, nyLovely little French bistro in Williamsburg. Great place to stop in for a glass of wine. I\'ve heard the food can be pretty good.

properties.name: Five Points
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer31 Great Jones St, new york, nyWonderful little hidden gem on Great Jones. Great food. Quiet, perfect for business lunches.

properties.name: Follow Me Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 145 E 62nd St, new york, nyNice little brunch or sandwich place. Quiet, homey ambiance, and reasonable prices. Perfect when you\'re done shopping at Bloomingdale\'s.

properties.name: Frankie's 457
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer457 Court Street, Brooklyn, NYGreat little panini place. Excellent bar, too. Good for brunch.

properties.name: Gimme Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 495 Lorimer St, Brooklyn, NYBest coffee in New York City.

properties.name: Grey Dog's Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 33 Carmine Street, new york, NYGreat brunch, sandwiches, salads, and pastries. Crowded and no waiter service, but good for a friendly lunch or dinner.

properties.name: Grimaldi's Pizzeria
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer19 Cadman Plz W, Brooklyn, NYA legendary Brooklyn pizzeria. I ate there, and it was pretty decent, though Sam wasn\'t blown away.

properties.name: Grumpy Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 224 West 20th Street, New York, NYThis place has great coffee and an outdoor garden.

properties.name: Gstaad
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer43 W 26th St, New York, NYBig, Eurotrashy bar.

properties.name: Hamachi Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer34 E 20th St, new york, NYDecent sushi. A good alternative when Misu Sushi across the street\'s a bit too crowded.

properties.name: Hunan Delight
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer752 Union, brooklyn, nyGreat old-school Chinese with outdoor seating.

properties.name: Jadis Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 42 Rivington, new yorkLovely, romantic wine bar with a light menu of sandwiches and salads and cheeses. Eat at rustic wooden benches or relax on leather couches in back.

properties.name: Japonica
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer100 University pl, new york, NYGood sushi place, though a bit pricey. Good for business lunches.

properties.name: Joe's Shanghai
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer24 W 56th St, New York, nyChinese food here\'s been recommended. Soup dumplings are a specialty. Worth a visit.

properties.name: Kitchenette
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer156 Chambers Street, New York, NYOne of the best brunch places around. Expect a wait.

properties.name: Kitchenette Uptown
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer1272 Amsterdam Ave., New York, NYGreat brunch, but expect a wait.

properties.name: L'Annam
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer121 University Pl, new york, nyDecent Vietnamese place. Cheap.

properties.name: L'Annam
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer393 Third Avenue, new york, nyDecent Vietnamese place. Very cheap.

properties.name: Le Pain Quotidien
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer38 East 19th Street, new york, nyGreat French rustic food served at long wooden tables. Excellent pastries, too.

properties.name: Lido
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer200 Columbia St, brooklyn, nyFun bar with occasional karaoke and deer hunting game.

properties.name: Live Bait
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer14 E 23rd St, new york, nyFun bar/restaurant with a comfy vibe. Not business appropriate.

properties.name: Lunetta
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer116 Smith Street, Brooklyn, NYSam says this place has fantastic Italian food.

properties.name: Lunetta
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer116 Smith Street, Brooklyn, NYFabulous food, sort of Italian. Really, really good food. Small, charming place.

properties.name: Madeleine
properties.description: Posted by DrmoldawerLovely French cafe and bakery with excellent macarons.

properties.name: Markt
properties.description: Posted by DrmoldawerMeatpacking District restaurant relocated to Chelsea. Looks nice, old school.

properties.name: Mishima Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer164 Lexington Ave, new york, nyExcellent, fresh fish and good service. Way too small though, and sort of crummy ambiance. Good for ordering out, if you\'re looking for really good sushi.

properties.name: Mizu Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer29 East 20th, new york, NYBest reasonably priced sushi in town.

properties.name: Mo Pitkin's
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 34 Ave A, New york, NYLike a little taste of the Catskills. Two performance venues, great acts, and excellent food with a Jewish flair. Try the burger with chopped liver.

properties.name: Momoya Sushi
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer162 W 21st St, new york, nyVery good sushi, a little upscale but not too pricey. Wallace Shawn sat at the next table.

properties.name: Ninth Street Espresso
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 136 E. 13th Street, new york, nyGreat coffee. Located inside Classic Stage Company, so the ambiance is a little "box office," but there are table and chairs and you can always get it to go.

properties.name: Ninth Street Espresso
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 700 E 9th St, new york, NYExcellent coffee.

properties.name: Oslo Coffee Company
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 133 Roebling St Ste B, Brooklyn, NYGreat coffee.

properties.name: Ottimo
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer6 W 24th St, new york, nyDecent Neapolitan Italian food. Old fashioned. Nothing spectacular, but very big portions.

properties.name: Papillon
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer22 East 54th Street, new york, nyBig, open, airy French bistro with good food and service. Good business lunch.

properties.name: Podunk
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer231 East 5th St., new york, nyAdorable little tea shop with all kinds of teas and fresh-baked cookies.

properties.name: Puttanesca Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 859 9th Ave, new york, NYNice Italian place. Old-fashioned, but decent food.

properties.name: Revival
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer129 East 15th Street, New York, NYGreat bar near Union Square. They do a bring-your-own-iPod night and some other fun stuff. Garden in the back, too.

properties.name: Rice on Lexington
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 115 Lexington Ave, new york, nyGreat Asian cuisine, a mix of what seemed to be Thai, Chinese, Indian, and more. Great brunch. Free wifi.

properties.name: Rodeo Bar & Grill
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer375 3rd Avenue, New York, NY, 10016Great tex-mex, funky Country vibe, free peanuts at the bar. Country music performs in one part of the space.

properties.name: Sapa
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer43 West 24th, New York, NYCute Southeast Asian fusion place with an excellent happy hour.

properties.name: Snack Taverna
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer63 Bedford St, new york, nyExcellent Greek food with a very country Mediterranean vibe. Make reservations. Pricey. Best Greek salad I\'ve ever had.

properties.name: Sugar Sweet Sunshine Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer126 Rivington St, New York, NYAbsolutely delicious cupcakes and cake.

properties.name: Supper
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer156 E 2nd St, new york, NYGood Italian place on the LES. Rustic feel, good for birthdays.

properties.name: Sushiden
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer123 W. 49th St, New York, NY, 10019Small, upscale sushi place perfect for business meetings.

properties.name: Tarallucci e Vino
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer15 E 18th St, new york, NYOne of my favorite business lunch spots. Great paninis and coffee.

properties.name: Tartine
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer253 West 11th Street, New York, NYTeeny tiny French bistro. Always a bit of a wait, but good for intimate dinner or brunch.

properties.name: Tea and Sympathy
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 108 Greenwich Avenue, new york, nyFancy British place.

properties.name: Telegraphe Espresso Bar
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer  107 W. 18th Street, new york, nyGood coffee, decent paninis and pastries. Free wifi.

properties.name: ThaiNY
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer394 Third Avenue, new york, nyBrand new, yet to open Thai restaurant on Third Ave. Looks interesting, definitely worth a try.

properties.name: The Magician
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer118 Rivington, new york, nyThe bloggers hang out here, I guess.

properties.name: Think Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer  248 Mercer, New York, NYNice big coffee house filled with NYU students. Good coffee, pricey. Pretty sure there\'s free wifi.

properties.name: Trattoria dell'Arte
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer900 Seventh Avenue, New York, NYExpensive Italian place in the theater district. Good for business lunches.

properties.name: Vatan
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer409 Third Ave, new york, nyVegetarian Indian restaurant with a set menu and a very elaborate village theme. Food\'s good, aside from the lack of meat.

properties.name: Zaytoons
properties.description: Posted by Drmoldawer 594 Vanderbilt Avenue
